import jwt from "jsonwebtoken";

export const generateTokens = (userId: string) => {
  const accessToken = jwt.sign(
    { userId },
    process.env.JWT_SECRET!,
    { expiresIn: "15m" }
  );

  const refreshToken = jwt.sign(
    { userId },
    process.env.JWT_REFRESH_SECRET!,
    { expiresIn: "7d" }
  );

  return { accessToken, refreshToken };
};

// This is your Prisma schema file,
// learn more about it in the docs: https://pris.ly/d/prisma-schema

generator client {
  provider = "prisma-client-js"

datasource db {
  provider = "postgresql"
  url      = env("DATABASE_URL")
}

model User {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  email         String    @unique
  name          String
  password      String    // bcrypt hashed
  avatar        String?   @default("https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=default")
  bio           String?
  phone         String?
  isDriver      Boolean   @default(false)
  isRestaurant  Boolean   @default(false)
  isCourier     Boolean   @default(false)
  isAdmin       Boolean   @default(false)
  verificationPin String? // PIN for wallet actions
  kycVerified   Boolean   @default(false)
  kycData       Json?     // Contains: idType, idNumber, address, etc.

  // Relations
  profile       Profile?
  wallet        Wallet?
  rides         Ride[]
  driverRides   Ride[]    @relation("DriverRides")
  orders        Order[]
  courtierOrders Delivery[]
  matches       Match[]   @relation("Player1")
  matches2      Match[]   @relation("Player2")
  wonMatches    Match[]   @relation("Winner")
  refTokens     RefreshToken[]
  homePhotos    HomePhoto[]

  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt
}

model Profile {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  user          User      @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  userId        String    @unique
  displayName   String?
  bio           String?
  avatar        String?
  totalRides    Int       @default(0)
  totalOrders   Int       @default(0)
  rating        Float     @default(5.0)
  reviews       String    @default("[]") // JSON string of reviews
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt
}

model RefreshToken {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  user          User      @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  userId        String
  token         String    @unique
  expiresAt     DateTime
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
}

model Wallet {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  user          User      @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  userId        String    @unique
  balance       Float     @default(0)
  currency      String    @default("NGN")
  locked        Float     @default(0) // Locked for pending transactions
  transactions  Transaction[]
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt
}

model Transaction {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  wallet        Wallet    @relation(fields: [walletId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  walletId      String
  type          String    // "deposit", "withdrawal", "bet", "winnings", "transfer"
  amount        Float
  status        String    @default("pending") // pending, completed, failed
  reference     String?   // Paystack ref, bank ref, etc.
  description   String?
  metadata      Json?     // Extra data (game ID, ride ID, etc.)
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt

  @@index([walletId])
  @@index([createdAt])
}

model Ride {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  user          User      @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  userId        String

  driverId      String?
  pickupLat     Float
  pickupLng     Float
  dropoffLat    Float
  dropoffLng    Float
  pickupAddress String
  dropoffAddress String
  status        String    @default("requested") // requested, accepted, in_transit, completed, cancelled

  baseFare      Float     @default(500) // Base in NGN

  paymentMethod String    @default("wallet") // wallet or card

  rideEndTime   DateTime?
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt

  @@index([userId])
  @@index([driverId])
  @@index([status])

  description   String?
  image         String?
  location      String
  latitude      Float
  longitude     Float
  phone         String?
  rating        Float     @default(5.0)
  deliveryTime  Int       @default(30) // minutes

  isFastestDelivery Boolean @default(false)
  menu          Json      // Array of menu items
  orders        Order[]
  isActive      Boolean   @default(true)
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt

  @@index([isFastestDelivery])
}

model Order {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  user          User      @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  userId        String
  restaurant    Restaurant @relation(fields: [restaurantId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  restaurantId  String
  items         Json      // Array of { menuItemId, name, quantity, price }
  totalAmount   Float
  deliveryFee   Float     @default(0)
  tax           Float     @default(0)
  finalAmount   Float
  status        String    @default("pending") // pending, confirmed, preparing, on_delivery, delivered, cancelled
  deliveryAddress String
  deliveryLat   Float?
  deliveryLng   Float?
  estimatedTime Int?      // minutes
  paymentMethod String    @default("wallet")
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt

  @@index([userId])
  @@index([restaurantId])
  @@index([status])
}

model Delivery {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  order         Order?    @relation(fields: [orderId], references: [id])
  orderId       String?
  courier       User      @relation(fields: [courierId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
  courierId     String
  pickupLat     Float
  pickupLng     Float
  dropoffLat    Float
  dropoffLng    Float
  currentLat    Float?
  currentLng    Float?
  status        String    @default("pending") // pending, accepted, in_transit, delivered, cancelled
  fare          Float
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt

  @@index([courierId])
  @@index([status])
}

model Game {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  name          String    // "Snooker", "Ludo", "W/Hot", etc.
  description   String?
  minBet        Float     @default(100)
  maxBet        Float     @default(100000)
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
}

model Tournament {
  id            String    @id @default(cuid())
  name          String
  game          String    // Game name
  description   String?
  entryFee      Float     @default(0)
  prizePool     Float     @default(0)
  status        String    @default("upcoming") // upcoming, active, completed
  matches       Match[]
  createdAt     DateTime  @default(now())
  updatedAt     DateTime  @updatedAt

  @@index([status])
}

model Match {

# üéÆ J'S ARCHED - Futuristic Super App MVP

**Rides | Food Delivery | Courier Dispatch | Esports | Wallet | Tournaments**

A never-seen-before, 3D 8K UI/UX super app combining ride-hailing, food delivery, package dispatch, interactive games, wallet management, and esports tournaments. Built with Next.js 14, Socket.io real-time updates, and Prisma ORM.

## ‚ú® Features

### üöó **Ride-Hailing**
- Real-time ride requests & driver matching
- 3D map with live vehicle tracking
- Surge pricing logic
- Accept/Decline UI for drivers

### üçî **Food Delivery**
- Dynamic restaurant listings
- Real-time order tracking on 3D map
- "Fastest Delivery" highlights
- Integrated Paystack & OPay payments

### üì¶ **Courier Dispatch**
- Real-time package tracking
- 3D animated courier icons
- Live dispatch dashboard

### üéÆ **Interactive Games & Esports**
- **3D Games**: Snooker, Spin the Bottle, 1Punch, Cup Game, Ludo, W/Hot
- Multiplayer turn-based play with real-time sockets
- Live tournament brackets
- Real-money betting with wallet integration
- Admin tournament monitoring

### üí∞ **Secure Wallet**
- Deposits via Paystack, OPay, Banks
- Withdrawals with KYC verification
- PIN-protected transactions
- Visual transaction ledger
- All funds route to: **Favour Tamuno Bright** (9011846464 - OPay)

### üë§ **Profile & Security**
- Edit display name, bio, avatar
- KYC/Verification system
- PIN-protected wallet actions

### üõ°Ô∏è **Admin Dashboard**
- Monitor live rides, orders, games, tournaments
- Analytics with 3D charts
- Revenue & user activity tracking

## üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack

| Layer | Technology |
|-------|-----------|
| **Frontend** | Next.js 14, React 18, Tailwind CSS |
| **3D Graphics** | Three.js, React-Three-Fiber, Drei |
| **Real-time** | Socket.io, WebSockets |
| **Backend** | Node.js, Express, TypeScript |
| **Database** | PostgreSQL, Prisma ORM |
| **Auth** | JWT (Access + Refresh), Bcrypt |
| **Payments** | Paystack, OPay, Bank Integration |
| **Security** | Helmet, CORS, Rate Limiting, Zod |
| **Deployment** | Vercel, Railway, Docker |

## üöÄ Quick Start

### Prerequisites
- Node.js 18+
- PostgreSQL 14+
- npm or yarn

### 1. Clone & Install
```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/js-arched-v0.git
cd js-arched-v0
npm install
npm run prisma:generate
```

### 2. Setup Database
```bash
# Create .env from example
cp .env.example .env

# Update DATABASE_URL in .env with your PostgreSQL connection

# Run migrations & seed
npm run prisma:migrate
npm run seed
```

### 3. Run Development Servers
```bash
# Terminal 1: Next.js frontend
npm run dev

# Terminal 2: Socket.io server
npm run socket

# Or run both concurrently:
npm run dev:all
```

Visit `http://localhost:3000`

## üîå Socket.io Events

### Rides
- `requestRide` - User requests a ride
- `rideAvailable` - Notify drivers of available ride
- `acceptRide` - Driver accepts ride
- `updateDriverLocation` - Real-time driver location
- `rideAccepted` - Ride accepted by driver

### Food
- `orderFood` - Place food order
- `foodOrderCreated` - Order confirmed
- `courierAcceptDelivery` - Courier picks up order
- `updateCourierLocation` - Real-time courier tracking

### Games
- `joinGameTournament` - Player enters tournament
- `gameResult` - Match completed, winner announced
- `playerJoinedGame` - Broadcasting player join

### Wallet
- `walletTransaction` - Deposit/Withdrawal/Bet
- `transactionProcessed` - Transaction confirmed

### Admin
- `adminJoinDashboard` - Admin joins monitoring
- `liveStatsUpdate` - Real-time stats broadcast

## üí≥ Payment Integration

### Paystack
1. Get test keys from [Paystack Dashboard](https://dashboard.paystack.com)
2. Add to `.env`:
   ```
   NEXT_PUBLIC_PAYSTACK_PUBLIC_KEY=pk_test_xxx

   ```

### OPay

   ```

   OPAY_PUBLIC_KEY=xxx
   ```

## üîê Security Checklist

- ‚úÖ JWT with 15min access + 7day refresh tokens
- ‚úÖ Bcrypt password hashing
- ‚úÖ HTTP-only cookies for tokens
- ‚úÖ CORS configured for frontend only
- ‚úÖ Rate limiting on API routes
- ‚úÖ Helmet security headers
- ‚úÖ Zod schema validation
- ‚úÖ Paystack webhook signature verification
- ‚úÖ PIN protection for wallet actions
- ‚úÖ KYC verification for withdrawals

## üöÄ Deployment

### Vercel (Recommended for Next.js)
```bash
npm install -g vercel
vercel login
vercel deploy
```

### Railway
1. Connect PostgreSQL
2. Deploy from GitHub
3. Set environment variables in Railway dashboard

### Docker (Self-hosted)

```bash
docker-compose up -d
```

## üìä Database Schema Highlights

**Key Models:**
- `User` - Base user with roles (driver, restaurant, courier, admin)
- `Profile` - Extended user info
- `Wallet` - User balance & locked funds
- `Transaction` - All financial activities
